title: Tour de France to add padding but will keep descents: ‘We do not want to end up having bike races in parking lots’
content:
Stakeholders straddle line between enhancing safety and protecting the essence of bike racing: 'We will not eliminate the final descents. That's not racing.'

Read the full article at Tour de France to add padding but will keep descents: ‘We do not want to end up having bike races in parking lots’ on Velo.
author: ahood
